name: SimpleLegal
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: simple legal
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Simple Legal has a representation beyond its unique Alexa skills. It is a movement where legal professionals attempt to train new technologies to reach out to underserved groups. Simple Legal is a message that legal professionals can do better. 

The World Justice Project shows that 77% of US citizens who encountered a legal issue did not have that issue resolved by a lawyer. Lawyers can utilize already existing technological tools, train them, and deliver better service with enhanced productivity.

Consequently, Simple Legal offers a client-centric value creation and extends a solution to fix access to justice problem. Simple Legal shows a potential where lawyers can provide more exceptional value to customers who need results for their needs. 

Here, Simple Legal opens with a proposal to give the most recent immigration news from a reliable source; 
Fragomen Law Firm - news feed - https://www.fragomen.com/insights/alerts. 

This is only the beginning. Though the current version is a humble attempt, Paralexa is committed to improve its Alexa skills and provide guidance to the people in need.

Please let us know your feedback.
Emrah Tanyildizi - emrahtanyildizi@gmail.com
Onder Secen - onder.secen@gmail.com
